title: Got chosen to reinstall League of Legends
body:
Hi fellow Summoners,

If you're chosen to trial the new client, don't upgrade to it.

I got chosen and just updated it today and got an unknown error. Having to reinstall LoL now, haha.

replies.body: It's to download the play the game button so your Champion select, your queue and anything else that happens when you press play. You may get unknown error as it is a common thing when updating even patches generally repairing then trying to update should work if not contact riot.
